pages.text: Pretty soon the sack we gave you won't cut it anymore. If you can just get your hands on some leather and a couple of iron nuggets you could probably use your DIY skills to remake a sack into something a lot more comfortable to carry when traveling. As an added bonus this pack doesn't have to be placed to access it's contents.
You even have a way to strap your $(l:sleeping/bedroll#dc_bedroll)Bedroll$(/l) to the pack. Too bad only that type of bedroll fits there.
